_header: So it befell after this tide
_description: Gospel for the Second Sunday after Epiphany incorrectly headed: Dominica ija post octavam epiphie in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: So it bifell efter þis tideWeding was made als of a bride…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þus es it red in haly kirkHow crist bigan wonders to wirk
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Nupcie facte sunt in chana galilee.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica secunda post octava epiphanie Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 33va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.281-287.
